SELECT NVL(SUM(BUDGET),0) AS COL_VALUE, COUNT(ID) AS COL_COUNT FROM T_BSS_PMS_COLLECT_PLAN WHERE STATUS = 2
AND to_char(CREATED_AT,'yyyy') = to_char(#{createdAt},'yyyy')

SELECT COL_NAME, COL_VALUE, COL_ID FROM (SELECT ORG.SHORT_NAME AS COL_NAME, NVL(SUM(P.BUDGET), 0) AS COL_VALUE, ORG. ID AS COL_ID FROM T_SES_OMS_ORG ORG LEFT JOIN (SELECT ORG_ID, ID FROM T_SES_BMS_USER) U ON ORG. ID = U.ORG_ID LEFT JOIN T_BSS_PMS_COLLECT_PLAN P ON U . ID = P.USER_ID WHERE ORG.TYPE_NAME = 2 AND P.STATUS = '2' AND ORG.IS_DELETED = 0 GROUP BY ORG.SHORT_NAME, ORG. ID ORDER BY COL_VALUE DESC) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10

SELECT COL_NAME, COL_VALUE, COL_ID FROM ( SELECT o. ID AS COL_ID, o.SHORT_NAME AS COL_NAME, NVL (SUM(D .BUDGET), 0) AS COL_VALUE FROM T_BSS_PMS_PURCHASE_DETAIL D LEFT JOIN T_SES_OMS_ORG o ON o. ID = D .ORGANIZATION_ID WHERE o.TYPE_NAME = 1 AND D.PRICE is NOT NULL AND D .HISTORY_STATUS = '0' AND o.IS_DELETED = 0 GROUP BY o.SHORT_NAME, o. ID ORDER BY COL_VALUE DESC ) WHERE ROWNUM <= 10

p.STATUS = 2 AND o.IS_DELETED = 0
